doc:
Felicia Montealegre https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Felicia_Montealegre 0 Felicia Cohn Montealegre (3 March 1922 – 16 June 1978) was a Chilean stage and television actress born in San Jose, Costa Rica. From 1951 until her death, she was married to the American composer and conductor Leonard Bernstein. Felicia_Cohn_Montealegre ( 3_March_1922 – 16_June_1978 ) was a_Chilean_stage_and_television_actress born in San_Jose , Costa_Rica . From 1951 until her_death , she was_married to the_American_composer_and_conductor_Leonard_Bernstein .
